name: Professional Thief Demo
description:
This game is still in early development, all features are subject to change in the future. You can expect some controls to be messy, you can expect bugs - I will work on fixing them before the final release.

NOTE 2: If the game is lagging on your PC, download the low quality edition - this is only here temporarily until I implement a quality selection menu in the game. This should fix if you have bad FPS.

PROFESSIONAL THIEF DEMO

Professional Thief is a first person game in which you take the role of a new thief who is just starting his criminal career. The game will take you to different locations - this demo contains two of them - where you will have a specific goal. Your task is to figure out what is the best way to escape and finish the level - there are lots of ways to do this.

For each level you will have a specific set of tools on you which you can use to progress through the level. The only tools in the demo are a sledge hammer used to smash walls and windows, lockpick which allows you to break locks, and a pistol which you can use to defend yourself from the enemies.

You can expect more levels, tools and features in the future. Until then, you can give me some feedback, suggestions, and bug reports. Have fun!
